query: Economy class mein saman ki kitni ijazat hai?
expected_response: Economy class musafir ko 20kg checked baggage aur 7kg cabin baggage ki ijazat hai

query: Extra saman ka kitna charge hai?
expected_response: Extra baggage ki qeemat mulki flights ke liye per kg 800 rupay aur international flights ke liye per kg 15 dollar hai

query: Kya main hand luggage ke sath laptop bag bhi le ja sakta hoon?
expected_response: Ji haan, aap apne cabin baggage ke ilawa ek laptop bag ya handbag le ja sakte hain

query: Checked baggage mein kaun si cheezain mamnoo hain?
expected_response: Mamnoo cheezain mein lithium batteries, power bank, lighter, teez dhaar cheezain aur aatishgeer mawad shamil hain

query: Cabin baggage ki weight ki had kya hai?

query: Saman jama karane ka counter kahan hai?

query: Kya main airport par extra saman check-in kar sakta hoon?
expected_response: Ji haan, aap availability ke mutabiq check-in counter par additional baggage allowance khareed sakte hain

query: Bachon ke liye saman ki ijazat kya hai?

query: Kya mauseeqi ke aalat cabin baggage ke tor par le ja sakte hain?

query: Saman check-in ke liye kitni jaldi pohanchna chahiye?

query: Kya main apne checked baggage ko tala laga sakta hoon?
expected_response: Ji haan, aap TSA approved locks istemal kar sakte hain; aam talon se bachein kyunke security ko aapke bag ka muaina karna par sakta hai

query: Agar mera saman zyada wazni ho to kya hoga?
expected_response: Aapko excess baggage fee deni hogi ya weight limit puri karne ke liye cheezain nikalni hongi

query: Kya sports ka saman checked baggage mein ijazat hai?
expected_response: Ji haan, golf clubs aur skis jaise sports equipment ijazat hai lekin additional charges lag sakte hain

query: Kya main apne cabin bag mein liquids le ja sakta hoon?
expected_response: Liquids 100ml ya is se kam ke containers mein hone chahiyein, saaf plastic bag mein rakhe hue (maximum 1 liter)

query: Business class ka baggage allowance kya hai?
expected_response: Business class passengers ko 30kg checked baggage aur 7kg cabin baggage ki ijazat hai

query: Kya power bank checked luggage mein le ja sakte hain?
expected_response: Nahi, power banks sirf cabin baggage mein hone chahiyein aag ki safety regulations ki wajah se

query: Kya main airport par apna saman lapet sakta hoon?
expected_response: Ji haan, check-in area ke qareeb fee ke iwaz baggage wrapping service available hai

query: Cabin luggage ke tor par kitne size ka bag ijazat hai?
expected_response: Maximum size 56cm x 36cm x 23cm hai

query: Main free mein kitne bags check-in kar sakta hoon?
expected_response: Yeh aapki airline aur ticket class par depend karta hai; economy mein usually 1-2 bags ijazat hain

query: Kya duty-free items cabin baggage allowance mein shamil hain?
expected_response: Duty-free purchases usually aapke cabin baggage allowance ke ilawa hoti hain

query: Kya main apne checked baggage mein khane ki cheezain le ja sakta hoon?
expected_response: Zyada tar non-liquid food items ijazat hain; fresh produce ke liye destination country restrictions check karein

query: Agar mera baggage size restrictions se zyada ho to kya hoga?
expected_response: Oversized baggage check karna zaroori hai aur additional fee lag sakti hai

query: Kya baggage drop ke liye alag queue hai?
expected_response: Kuch airlines online check-in karne wale passengers ke liye dedicated baggage drop counters provide karti hain

query: Kya main electronics checked baggage mein le ja sakta hoon?
expected_response: Qeemti electronics cabin baggage mein le jane ki tajweez hai taky nuqsan ya chori se bacha ja sake

query: Baggage check-in par kaun si items ka elaan karna zaroori hai?
expected_response: Qeemti items, nazuk saman, lithium batteries aur kisi bhi limited items ka elaan karein

query: Kya bare size ke saman ke liye storage facilities hain?
expected_response: Oversized baggage ko special counters par handle kiya jata hai; specific procedures ke liye apni airline se rabta karein

query: Kya main online check-in ke baad baggage allowance add kar sakta hoon?
expected_response: Ji haan, aap baggage drop se pehle airport counter par additional allowance khareed sakte hain

query: Cabin baggage mein kya ijazat nahi hai?

query: Main kharab shuda baggage ki ittila kaise doon?
expected_response: Airport chornay se pehle foran airline ke baggage service counter par damaged baggage ki report karein

query: Kya main apni shadi ka libas cabin baggage ke tor par le ja sakti hoon?
expected_response: Wedding dress cabin baggage ke tor par le jaye ja sakte hain agar wo overhead bin mein aa jayein ya aap garment bag ki darkhwast kar sakte hain

query: Kya aarzi tor par saman store karne ke liye locker hain?
expected_response: Departure hall mein fee ke iwaz temporary baggage storage lockers available hain

query: Saman check-in ke liye kaun se documents chahiye?
expected_response: Baggage check-in ke liye aapko apna boarding pass aur valid ID/passport chahiye

query: Kya main apne baggage allowance ko bags mein taqseem kar sakta hoon?
expected_response: Ji haan, aap apne total weight allowance ko multiple bags mein divide kar sakte hain jab tak har ek individual bag limit se exceed na kare

query: Kya nazuk items checked baggage mein ijazat hain?
expected_response: Nazuk items check ki ja sakti hain lekin munasib tareeqe se packed honi chahiyein; qeemti cheezain cabin mein le jane ki tajweez hai

query: Students ke liye baggage allowance kya hai?
expected_response: Kuch airlines students ke liye additional baggage allowance deti hain; specific policies ke liye apni airline se check karein

query: Kya main dawaayein cabin baggage mein le ja sakta hoon?
expected_response: Ji haan, prescription medicines proper documentation ke sath cabin baggage mein ijazat hain

query: Airlines cabin baggage weight ke bare mein kitni strict hain?
expected_response: Zyada tar airlines khaas tor par peak seasons mein 7kg limit ko sakhti se enforce karti hain

query: Kya main pet carriers ko baggage ke tor par check-in kar sakta hoon?
expected_response: Approved carriers mein chote pets cabin mein ijazat ho sakte hain; bare pets checked baggage ya cargo ke tor par safar karein

query: Apne bag ko check karne se pehle mujhe kya nikalna chahiye?
expected_response: Tamam qeemti cheezain, documents, chabian, dawaayein, electronics aur kharab hone wali items nikal dein

query: Kya camping equipment aur tent ijazat hain?
expected_response: Camping equipment checked baggage mein ijazat hai; chaku jaise teez dhaar items munasib tareeqe se packed honi chahiyein

query: Kya main bachon ka khana cabin baggage mein le ja sakta hoon?
expected_response: Baby food aur milk sheer khawar bachon ke sath safar karne wale passengers ke liye liquid restrictions se mustasna hain

query: Agar main apna baggage tag jama nahi karta to kya hoga?
expected_response: Baggage tag aapke luggage claim karne ke liye zaroori hai; agar aap use kho dein to foran report karein

query: Kya premium economy ke liye weight restrictions hain?
expected_response: Premium economy passengers ko usually 25kg checked baggage allowance milti hai

query: Kya main dosre passengers ke sath baggage consolidate kar sakta hoon?
expected_response: Baggage pooling airline policy par depend karta hai; kuch ek hi booking par passengers ke liye ijazat deti hain

query: Checked bags ke liye kaun si packaging tajweez ki jati hai?
expected_response: Nazuk items ke liye hard-shell suitcases istemal karein, tamam zippers secure karein aur TSA locks istemal karein

query: Kya batteries checked luggage mein ijazat hain?
expected_response: Spare lithium batteries cabin baggage mein honi chahiyein; devices mein installed batteries check ki ja sakti hain

query: Kya main booking ke baad apne baggage allowance change kar sakta hoon?
expected_response: Ji haan, aap check-in se pehle online ya airport counter par additional allowance khareed sakte hain

query: Gumshuda baggage ki zimmedari ki had kya hai?
expected_response: International flights ke liye airlines ki zimmedari per passenger taqreeban 1,500-2,000 dollar tak limited hai

query: Kya koi color-coded baggage tags hain?
expected_response: Airlines destination aur route ki shanakht ke liye color-coded tags istemal karti hain; priority tags mukhtalif rang ke ho sakte hain

query: Kya main Christmas ki sajawat checked baggage mein le ja sakta hoon?
expected_response: Ghair nazuk sajawat ijazat hai; sheeshe ki decorations se bachein ya unhein tootne se bachane ke liye munasib tareeqe se pack karein

query: Main apni boorhi walida ke sath safar kar raha hoon, kya humein saman mein madad mil sakti hai?
expected_response: Ji haan, Islamabad International Airport buzurg musafiro aur unke saman ke liye jaame madadi khidmat faraham karta hai. Aap check-in counter par muft wheelchair aur porter services ki darkhwast kar sakte hain. Hamara tarbiyat yafta amla aapki walida ki check-in area se lekar security screening tak mukammal madad karega, aur wo poray amal ke dauran aapke saman ko uthane aur munazzam karne mein bhi madad karenge. Porter service mein bag ko check-in belt par load karna, aapke sath security area tak jana, aur yeh yaqeeni banana shamil hai ke aapke tamam saman ko munasib tareeqe se sambhala jaye. Behtareen tajurbe ke liye, jab aap pehli baar check-in counter par pohanchein to airline ke amle ko apni madad ki zarooriyat ke barey mein aagah karein, aur wo fori madad ka bandubast karenge.

query: Agar meri munsalik parvaz mukhtalif airline ki hai to kya hoga?
expected_response: Jab aapki Islamabad International Airport par mukhtalif airlines ke sath munsalik parwazain hain, to aapko apna checked shuda saman pehli parvaz ke baggage claim area se jama karna hoga aur phir ise apni dosri airline ke namzad check-in counter par dobara check karna hoga. Yeh inter-airline connections ke liye meyari tareeqa kar hai kyunke har airline ka alag baggage handling system aur zimmedari hoti hai. Apni pehli parvaz ki rawangi se pehle, apni ibtedai airline ke check-in amle ke sath mukammal muntaqli ke tareeqa kar ki tasdeeq karein, kyunke wo waqt aur aapki munsalik airline ke liye konsa counter istemaal karna hai ke barey mein mukhassis rahnumai faraham kar sakte hain. Yaqeeni banayein ke parwazo ke darmiyan kafi waqt ho - hum airlines tabdeel karte waqt mulki connections ke liye kam az kam 3-4 ghante aur bain ul aqwami connections ke liye 4-5 ghante ki sifarish karte hain.

query: Kya main apne hand luggage mein khushk mewa jaat aur giri dar mewe le ja sakta hoon?
expected_response: Ji haan, aap apne hand luggage mein khushk mewa jaat, giri dar mewe, beej aur degar package shuda namkeen baghair kisi miqdaar ki pabandi ya khasoosi ijazat ki zaroorat ke le ja sakte hain. Yeh ashya maayeat ya mehdood saman ke tor par darjabandi nahi hain, is liye wo baghair kisi masle ke security screening se guzar jati hain. Sahulat ke liye aur security check ko tez karne ke liye, behtar hai ke in khane ki ashya ko unki asli sealed packaging mein rakhein ya unhein saaf, shaffaf plastic bag ya containers mein rakhein. Yeh security ahlkaro ke liye X-ray screening ke dauran mawad ki fori shanakht ko asan banata hai. Maqbool ashya jaise badam, kaju, pista, khushk khoobani, khajoorein, kishmish aur trail mix aam tor par musafiro ki taraf se le jaye jate hain aur bilkul qabil-e-qubool hain.

query: Meri parvaz 5 ghante taakhir ka shikar hai, main apna saman kahan store kar sakta hoon?
expected_response: Ahem parvaz ki taakhir ke liye, Islamabad International Airport departure hall ke markazi dakhili raste ke qareeb left luggage storage sahuliyat pesh karta hai. Storage service 24/7 kaam karti hai aur aapke saman ke size aur wazn ke lehaz se taqreeban 300-500 rupay per bag per din wasool karti hai. Yeh sahulat mehfooz hai, CCTV cameras se nigraani ki jati hai, aur tarbiyat yafta ahlkaro ki nigraani mein hai jo aapko ek claim ticket faraham karenge. Mutabadil tor par, aapko apni airline ke customer service desk par check karna chahiye, kyunke bohat si airlines ahem taakhir se mutasir musafiro ke liye muft aarzi baggage storage pesh karti hain.

query: Kya yahan khud baggage tag print karne ki machine hai?
expected_response: Nahi, Islamabad International Airport par fil waqt musafiro ke istemaal ke liye self-service baggage tag printing kiosk dastyab nahi hain. Tamam baggage tags check-in counters par majaaz airline amle ki taraf se print aur munsalik kiye jane chahiye. Yeh nizam is liye maujood hai kyunke baggage tags mein mukhassis barcodes aur raste ki maaloomat hoti hai jo airline ke baggage handling system mein durust tareeqe se daakhil honi chahiye. Airline ka amla sahih manzil ke codes, parvaz numbers aur handling hidayaat ke sath tag print karne ke liye tarbiyat yafta hai.

query: Kya main apna Quran Pak aur tasbeeh hand luggage mein le ja sakta hoon?
expected_response: Ji haan, Quran Pak, tasbeeh, namaz ki chattai, Islami kutub, aur degar mazhabi ashya tamam Pakistani airports par cabin baggage aur checked shuda saman dono mein mukammal tor par ijazat shuda hain. Yeh ashya zaati mazhabi mawad ke tor par shumar hoti hain aur airport security zawabit ke tahat ehtiraam faraham kiya jata hai. Aap apna Quran kisi bhi format mein le ja sakte hain. Lakri, patthar ya plastic ki tasbeeh baghair pabandi ke jaez hain. Bohat se Muslim musafir Zamzam ki chhoti botlein, itr, ya miswak bhi le jate hain.

query: Mujhe apne sheerkhwar bachay ke liye bachay ka doodh powder le jana hai, kya yeh jaez hai?
expected_response: Ji haan, bachay ka formula doodh powder, sheerkhwar khoraak, aur mutaliq feeding supplies cabin baggage mein mukammal tor par jaez hain. Pakistani airport security bachon ke sath safar karne wale waldain ke liye khasoosi rahaish faraham karti hai. Aap apne poray safar ke liye kafi formula le ja sakte hain, bashamool mumkina taakhir ke liye izafi hisse. Sheerkhwar ke sath safar karte waqt bachay ka formula powder ki miqdaar ki hadood se mustasniya hai. Formula ko iske asli branded container mein rakhna madadgar hai.

query: Mere suitcase ka pahiya toota hua hai, kya airline ise qubool karegi?
expected_response: Ji haan, airlines tootay hue pahiyo wale saman ko check-in ke liye qubool karengi. Taham, yeh sakhti se sifarish ki jati hai ke aap apne kharab saman ko peshawrana wrapping service par lapet lein, jiski qeemat taqreeban 200-300 rupay per bag hai. Wrapping mazeed nuqsan ko rokti hai, tootay hue hisson ko conveyor belt par phansnay se bachati hai, aur bag ke mawad ko numayish se bachati hai. Agar aapka pahiya mukammal tor par alag ho gaya hai to check-in amle ko muttalay karein take wo aapke bag par nazuk tag laga sakein.

query: Kya main apna rawayati huqqa checked shuda saman mein la sakta hoon?
expected_response: Ji haan, rawayati huqqay checked shuda saman mein jaez hain. Taham, huqqa bilkul saaf hona chahiye jismein tambaaku ka koi oshesh na ho. Packing se pehle tamam chambers, naliyaan, aur pyale ko achhi tarah saaf karein. Apne huqqay ko ehtiyat se kafi cushioning ke sath pack karein take sheeshay ki buniyad tootne se bachay. Bubble wrap, foam, ya motay kapray padding ke liye achhi tarah kaam karte hain. Agar huqqay mein kai hisse hain to unhein alag alag pack karne par ghour karein.

query: Kya chhotay bachon wale khandano ke liye khasoosi counter hai?
expected_response: Ji haan, Islamabad International Airport mein chhotay bachon ke sath safar karne wale musafiro ke liye khasoosi family check-in lines hain, jo counters 15-18 par waqay hain. Yeh tarjeehi lines wazehan tor par nishan zad hain aur waldain ke liye check-in ko tez aur kam dabao wala banane ke liye design ki gayi hain. Family lines mein aam tor par chhoti qatarain hoti hain aur amle ko family ki mukhassis zarooriyat mein madad ke liye tarbiyat di gayi hai. Airport mein bachay ke diaper tabdeel karne ke kamre, nursing room, aur bachon ke khelne ke ilaqe bhi hain.

query: Main apni cricket kit le ja raha hoon, kya mujhe kisi khaas dastavez ki zaroorat hai?
expected_response: Nahi, Islamabad International Airport par cricket ke saman ko checked baggage ke tor par le jane ke liye kisi khaas dastavez ya ijazat ki zaroorat nahi hai. Cricket ke bat, pads, helmet, dastane, stumps, aur degar cricket gear aam tor par musafiro ki taraf se muntaqil kiye jate hain. Aapki cricket kit aapke baqaida checked baggage weight allowance mein shumar hogi. Cricket bat checked saman mein hone chahiye aur cabin baggage mein nahi le jaye ja sakte. Qeemti signed bats ke liye izafi insurance coverage hasil karne par ghour karein.

query: Kya main apni walida ki silai machine check-in kar sakta hoon?
expected_response: Ji haan, aap silai machine ko baggage ke tor par check-in kar sakte hain. Ghareloo ashya aur aalaat checked saman mein aam tor par jaez hain bashart ke wo munasib tareeqe se pack hon. Packing se pehle, electric model ki power cord ko hata dein aur alag se pack karein. Sui ko hata dein ya mehfooz karein. Machine ko iski asli box mein pack karein, ya mazboot cardboard box ya hard shell suitcase istemaal karein. Machine aapke checked baggage weight allowance mein shumar hogi.

query: Meri parvaz 40 minute mein board ho rahi hai, kya main abhi saman check kar sakta hoon?
expected_response: Aap baggage check-in ki aakhri had ke bohat qareeb hain. Mulki parwazo ke liye baggage check-in aam tor par rawangi se 45 minute pehle band ho jata hai, jabke bain ul aqwami parwazo ke liye 60 minute pehle. Sirf 40 minute boarding tak, aap bain ul aqwami parwazo ke liye aakhri waqt se guzar chuke hain aur mulki parwazo ke liye had par hain. Fori tor par check-in counter par pohanchein aur apni surat-e-haal bayan karein. Kuch airlines istisniya bana sakti hain lekin wo paband nahi hain.

query: Main apne gaon shahad le jana chahta hoon, kya pabandiya hain?
expected_response: Shahad ko hawabazi security ke maqasid ke liye maayeat madda ke tor par darjabandi kiya jata hai. Checked saman ke liye, aap baghair pabandi ke kisi bhi miqdaar mein shahad pack kar sakte hain. Yaqeeni banayein ke bartan mazbooti se sealed aur leak-proof hain, aur unhein plastic bag mein lapet dein. Cabin baggage ke liye, shahad 100ml liquid rule ki pairwi karta hai. Zyada tar musafir checked baggage mein shahad pack karna pasand karte hain.

query: Kya meri doorbeen overhead bin mein ja sakti hai?
expected_response: Aapki doorbeen ka overhead bin mein jana bunyadi tor par iske size par munhasir hai. Chhoti portable doorbeen aksar cabin baggage ki zarooriyat poori karti hain aur cabin mein le jayi ja sakti hain. Bari doorbeen cabin size ki hadood se tajawuz karengi aur unhein cargo ke tor par check karna zaroori hoga. Agar aapki doorbeen qeemti hai to ise board par le jayein. Achhi tarah padded carrying case istemaal karein.

query: Mera bag bilkul 23kg hai, kya wo ise qubool karenge?
expected_response: Ji haan, agar aapka bag bilkul 23 kilogram hai to yeh baghair kisi izafi baggage charges ke qubool kiya jayega. 23 kilogram zyada tar airlines par economy class ke liye meyari checked baggage wazn ki had hai. Taham, yaad rakhein ke had se sirf 0.5 kilogram ya 1 kilogram zyada hona bhi izafi baggage fee ka sabab ban sakta hai. Agar aap had ke qareeb hain to apne bhaari ashya pehan lein ya kuch cheezein cabin baggage mein muntaqil karein.

query: Kya main apne rishtedaro ke liye Karachi ka mashoor Sohan Halwa la sakta hoon?
expected_response: Ji haan, aap Karachi ka mashoor Sohan Halwa, Multani Sohan Halwa, ya koi bhi maqami mithai apne checked baggage aur cabin baggage dono mein la sakte hain. Rawayati mithaiyaan Pakistani musafiro ki taraf se sab se zyada muntaqil ki jane wali ashya mein se hain. Sohan Halwa aur isi tarah ki khushk mithaiyaan maayeat ke tor par shumar nahi hoti. Checked baggage ke liye, mithaion ko unke asli boxes ya mehfooz containers mein pack karein.

query: Meri PIA parvaz kal mansookh ho gayi thi, kya main purane baggage tag istemaal kar sakta hoon?
expected_response: Nahi, aap mansookh shuda parvaz ke baggage tag istemaal nahi kar sakte. Jab parvaz mansookh ya dobara schedule ki jati hai to tamam baggage tags ghair moatabar ho jate hain. Har baggage tag mein ek khaas parvaz number, tareekh, manzil, aur rawangi ke waqt se juri mukhassis barcoded maaloomat hoti hai. Jab aap apni dobara scheduled parvaz ke liye airport pohanchein to apne saman, nayi booking ki tasdeeq, aur shanakht ke sath PIA check-in counter par jayein. Check-in amla taza baggage tag jaari karega.

query: Main apni ashya ki hifazat ke liye bubble wrap kahan se khareed sakta hoon?
expected_response: Badqismati se, Islamabad International Airport terminal area mein bubble wrap, foam, ya padding supplies nahi bechta. Taham, aapke paas kai mutabadil hain. Sab se asan option departure hall mein check-in counters ke qareeb waqay peshawrana baggage wrapping service hai, jo aapke poray suitcase ko sinaati taqat ke plastic wrap mein lapetne ke liye 200-300 rupay wasool karti hai. Androni cushioning ke liye, agar aapke paas airport pohanchne se pehle waqt hai to Rawalpindi ya Islamabad sheher mein stationery ki dukano se bubble wrap khareedein.

query: Kya main apna electric shaver cabin bag mein rakh sakta hoon?
expected_response: Ji haan, electric shaver, beard trimmer, aur degar battery se chalne wale grooming devices cabin baggage mein baghair kisi pabandi ke mukammal tor par jaez hain. Yeh zaati nigahdaasht ke electronic items khatarnak ya mamnoo saman ke tor par darjabandi nahi hain. Apne shaver ko apne cabin bag mein asani se qabil-e-rasaai rakhein. Agar aapke shaver mein lithium battery hai to ise darhaqqiqat cabin baggage mein rehna chahiye na ke checked saman mein.

query: Main PIA ke liye kaam karta hoon, mera amle ka baggage allowance kya hai?
expected_response: PIA mulazim ke tor par amle ki tickets ya ID travel par safar karte waqt, aapka baggage allowance baqaida musafir allowance se mukhtalif hai. Aam tor par, PIA amle ke paas zyada sakhi allowances hote hain, lekin ain wazn aur tukron ki hadein mukhtalif hoti hain. Apni surat-e-haal ke liye durust maaloomat ke liye, aapko PIA mulazim khidmat ke mohkame se check karna chahiye. Apne amle ke safar ke liye check-in karte waqt, apna PIA mulazim ID card apni amle ki ticket ke sath check-in counter par pesh karein.

query: Main apni behan ki shadi ke liye sone ke zeverat le ja raha hoon, kya pabandiya hain?
expected_response: Aap zaati ya khandani istemaal ke liye sone ke zeverat aur degar qeemti zeverat jaise shadi ke tohfe muntaqil kar sakte hain, lekin ahem security aur customs tashweesh hain. Zyada se zyada security ke liye, hamesha mehenge zeverat ko apne cabin baggage mein le jayein na ke checked saman mein. Pakistan ke andar mulki safar ke liye sone ke zeverat ki miqdaar par koi pabandi nahi hai, lekin bari miqdaaron ya aala qeematon ko khareedari ki raseedon ya khandani milkiyat ke record ke sath dastavez kiya jana chahiye.

query: Mere bag se biryani ki boo aa rahi hai, kya yeh masla hai?
expected_response: Aapke checked baggage mein sealed khane ki ashya jaise biryani se halki khoraak ki boo aam tor par qabil-e-qubool hai. Taham, amli tahafuzat hain. Tez, tund boo jo baggage hold mein phail sakti hai aur dosre musafiro ke saman ko mutasir kar sakti hai, shayistat se bachni chahiye. Asli tashweesh boo nahi balke yeh hai ke aya khana munasib tareeqe se sealed hai aur transit ke dauran leak ya phaile ga nahi.
